updates.title: Specialized Domain Evaluation
updates.description: MAXY models now have enhanced capabilities in Technical, Educational, Health, and News domains.

updates.title: Deep Research Integration
updates.description: MAXY 1.3 now uses dynamic web research for more accurate and up-to-date information.

updates.title: Bangalore Slang Support
updates.description: All MAXY models now understand and can respond with authentic Bangalore slang.
